title: Motometer column mount gauge holder FOUND

posts.content:
I wish to buy a Motometer style column mounted gauge holder.
Does anyone have one unused they wish to sell. I can repaint.
These were primarily sold as a gauge mount for a Beetle steering column. I plan to adjust the strap length to fit a Split column.

I am aware AAA sell a similar mount but I do not wish to buy one of these. I want the Motometer logo'd one to hold a 1957 Beetle vdo tacho.

Sadly Brezelwerks have moved on to other products.


FOUND ONE
